item.title: Need help to upgrade a "::noclip" block. (Making it cooler looking though)
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

I am wanting to make the player that uses noclip able to see the animation BEFORE he/she teleports to a jail like area.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 1)//Makes sure its for player blocking only//
   {  
      //A code to "wait" 
       stillgfx(542 , absY, absX); //Explosion = I want the player to see this before teleporting. 
      //Code to "wait" 
       stillgfx(542 , absY, absX); //Turns into stone then dies.
       //Code to "wait" 
       sendMessage("You have angered a higher power, now you will pay for what you done.");
       teleportToX = <X to where the jails are in the docks>;
       teleportToY = <Y to where the jails are in the docks>;
       teleblock = true;
   }

I don’t know how to get a time delay or something. Any suggestions anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to upgrade a "::noclip" block. (Making it cooler looking though)
